name: heat-wave
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.
flavor_text.emerald: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user exhales a heated breath to attack. It may also inflict a burn.
